data.name: Functions - Ersatz Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
'Functions' is the complete Ersatz Original Soundtrack, also arranged and produced by Paris Stalker (that's me!), the creator of Ersatz.

My love of music and more specifically game music has left a big impression on me as a person. To have this opportunity to not only make a complete game on my own, but also this accompanying soundtrack, is immensely exciting.

With the music being such a big part of the experience of Ersatz, it was necessary to create it in a way wherein it could dynamically progress at any moment, whilst matching the tone and setting of what was happening on screen. However, it was also very important to me that taken out of that context of play, it was still just good music. I really hope you enjoy the end result!

Tracklisting:
  • 01 - Seed
  • 02 - Growth
  • 03 - Regulation
  • 04 - Nutrition
  • 05 - Respiration
  • 06 - Reproduction
  • 07 - Excretion
  • 08 - Transport
  • 09 - Synthesis
  • 10 - Functions

All music is included in 320kbps MP3s, 350kbps OGGs & compression '0' FLACs, and original album artwork.
